      • create

        public static FaceDetector create​(java.lang.String xmlFileName,
                                  FaceDetector.Parameters params)
        Factory method. Builds a detector from an XML file.
        Parameters:
        xmlFileName - a XML file (with data trained with OpenCV) describing the Haar Cascade
        params - a parameter object (default settings are used if null is passed)
        Returns:
        The corresponding detector.

      • findFaces

        public java.util.List<FaceRegion> findFaces​(int[][] I)

      • merge

        protected java.util.List<FaceRegion> merge​(FaceRegion[] facesInit,
                                           int min_neighbors,
                                           double minOverlap)
        Merge the raw detections resulting from the detection step to avoid multiple detections of the same object. A threshold on the minimum numbers of rectangles that need to be merged for the resulting detection to be kept can be given, to lower the rate of false detections. Two rectangles need to be merged if they overlap enough. TODO: CHECK!! Make rectangles immutable!
        Parameters:
        facesInit - the raw detections returned by the detection algorithm
        min_neighbors - the minimum number of rectangles needed for the corresponding detection to be kept
        minOverlap - the minimum overlap required for merging two faces
        Returns:
        The merged rectangular detections.
